Sentencas: Nanoparticles of Zr5Ti7O24 ceramic have been prepared by the autoignited combustion technique.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Ionic Conductivity of Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 Ceramic Synthesized by Autoignited Combustion Technique

Sentencas: The phase purity of the ceramic was examined by x-ray diffraction method, yielding lattice parameters of a = 14.3 , b = 5.2 , and c = 5.1 .
Titulo: Structural Properties and Ionic Conductivity of Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 Ceramic Synthesized by Autoignited Combustion Technique

Sentencas: A narrow size distribution of the nanoparticles was determined by transmission electron microscopy with a peak at 21.55 nm.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Ionic Conductivity of Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 Ceramic Synthesized by Autoignited Combustion Technique

Sentencas: Coexistence of Zr/TiO6 octahedra and Zr/TiO4 tetrahedra was observed in the Raman spectrum.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Ionic Conductivity of Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 Ceramic Synthesized by Autoignited Combustion Technique

Sentencas: The optical bandgap of the ceramic was found to be 2.36 eV.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Ionic Conductivity of Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 Ceramic Synthesized by Autoignited Combustion Technique

Sentencas: The sample was pressed into a circular pellet and sintered at 1490A degrees C, obtaining 94.7% of theoretical density.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Ionic Conductivity of Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 Ceramic Synthesized by Autoignited Combustion Technique

Sentencas: The microstructure of the sintered pellet was analyzed by scanning electron microscopy, and the elemental composition was confirmed by energy-dispersive spectrometry.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Ionic Conductivity of Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 Ceramic Synthesized by Autoignited Combustion Technique

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopic analysis of the sample showed that ions are the main source of conduction.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Ionic Conductivity of Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 Ceramic Synthesized by Autoignited Combustion Technique

Sentencas: Two semicircles in the Cole-Cole plot provide evidence of grain and grain boundary contributions to the conductivity.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Ionic Conductivity of Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 Ceramic Synthesized by Autoignited Combustion Technique

Sentencas: The total ionic conductivity of the sample was 5.57 x 10(-1) S/m at 700A degrees C.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Ionic Conductivity of Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 Ceramic Synthesized by Autoignited Combustion Technique

Sentencas: The activation energies of grains and grain boundaries above 500A degrees C were 1.08 eV and 0.72 eV, respectively.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Ionic Conductivity of Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 Ceramic Synthesized by Autoignited Combustion Technique

Sentencas: Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 ceramic is a promising material for use as an electrolyte in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Structural Properties and Ionic Conductivity of Nanocrystalline Zr5Ti7O24 Ceramic Synthesized by Autoignited Combustion Technique
